snippet.title: NEW Silver Falls REVEAL Launch trailer! Exclusive to Nintendo DS! Out NOW!
snippet.description:
After four years of terrifying horror and gripping stories, Silver Falls launches its NEXT thrilling adventure! Are you ready for the horror?
Spend time with your favorite Silver Falls characters in this new tale!
DOWNLOAD FREE: https://sungrandstudios.itch.io/silverfallsmmm

Check out our latest Nintendo Switch launch, Guardians and Metal Exterminators S: https://youtu.be/Ksrxzb4Z8oQ

See the Silver Falls games at: http://silverfallsgame.com/
Support Silver Falls on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/jerreldulay
Find souvenirs and merchandise at: https://www.etsy.com/shop/sungrandshop

Twitter: https://twitter.com/silverfallsgame

Read the novel at: http://silverfallsgame.com/heavyshadow/ 
https://www.facebook.com/silverfallsgame
Silver Falls game series on Nintendo consoles. 

White Inside Its Umbra
3 Down Stars
Undertakers
Gaiden
Deathly Delusion Destroyers
Ruby River
Guardians and Metal Exterminators
Ghoul Busters
Vicarious Brothers
3 Down Stars
Undertakers
Episode Prelude
